casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Nancy Benge AUSTIN 294PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 15, 2017 Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Nancy Benge Austin. Lance B. Sigmon, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 13th of December 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 19th day of January 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
